name: Zero
description: Break through logic, subvert reality, completely abandon formulas based on experience to arrive at the final result.

set.set_2: Upon using a discharge skill to switch to the current weapon, gain a shield equal to **150%**/**200%**/**250%**/**300%** of ATK for **6** seconds.
set.set_4: While the shield is active, you and your teammates deal **16%**/**20%**/**24%**/**28%** more damage.
